body.name: Eclipse Tricia Modern Room Darkening Thermal Rod Pocket Window Curtain for Bedroom (1 Panel), 52 in x 84 in, Espresso
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: PREMIUM QUALITY - Masterly crafted 100% Polyester room darkening curtains. Sold as a single panel (Panel measures 52" wide and 84" long).

LIGHT BLOCKING LEVEL - Eclipse Room Darkening curtains blocks out between 93% to 97.9% of sunlight and harmful UV rays and ensures upmost privacy. Perfect for your living room, bedroom, kids room, nursery and more!

ENERGY EFFICIENT - Patented Thermaback technology designed to block out intrusive sunlight reduces unwanted noise and offers thermal benefits while providing all of the luxury and style of naturally flowing draperies. Provides an insulated barrier against summer heat and winter chill to balance your room temperature and save on energy bills.
EASY SET UP - 2" Rod Pocket design fits any standard or decorative rod for quick and easy installation. Ready to be hung right away.
CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Machine washable in gentle cycle and cold water, do not bleach. Warm iron and tumble dry at low temperatures.
body.description: Redecorate in a snap with Eclipse Tricia Thermapanel room-darkening panel pairs. These beautiful panels offer a superior blend of window fashion design and light blocking technology for any decor. Solid, drapeable curtains are woven with energy Saving yarns so that the technology blends seamlessly with fashion fabrics. Each rod pocket Tricia Thermapanel curtain measures 26 inches wide by your choice of 63, 84, or 95 inches long. 2 inch rod pocket accommodates up to a 1.25 inch curtain rod. 1.5 inch header adds decorative style. Sold as a panel pair. 100Percent polyester. Machine wash gentle cycle, tumble dry, do not bleach. Imported

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Experience the darkness, silence and beauty of Eclipse curtains. Eclipse blackout panels have been able to block out over 99% of intrusive light, unwanted noise and can help you save on home heating and cooling costs. Eclipse curtains offer a unique blend of fashion and function for any home decor. Eclipse curtains are perfect for the bedroom, kid's room or nursery, providing the ideal sleep environment for the whole family. The magic is in the Thermaback construction. Eclipse Tricia Collection Opacity Level: Room Darkening Redecorate in a snap with eclipse Tricia Thermapanel room-darkening curtains. These beautiful panels offer a superior blend of window fashion design and light blocking technology for any decor. Solid, drapeable curtain is woven with energy saving yarns so that the technology blends seamlessly with fashion fabrics. PREMIUM QUALITY - Masterly crafted 100% Polyester room darkening curtains. Sold as a single panel LIGHT BLOCKING LEVEL - Blocks out between 93% to 97.9% of sunlight and harmful UV rays and ensures upmost privacy. Perfect for your living room, bedroom, kids room, nursery and more! ENERGY EFFICIENT - Thermaback technology designed to block out intrusive sunlight reduces unwanted noise and offers thermal benefits while providing all the style of naturally flowing draperies. EASY SET UP - 2" Rod Pocket design fits any standard or decorative rod for quick and easy installation. Ready to be hung right away. CARE INSTRUCTIONS - Machine washable in gentle cycle and cold water, do not bleach. Warm iron and tumble dry at low temperatures.

Product Description Eclipse Thermaweave technology uses a triple-weave method that allows ordinary curtain yarns to be interwoven with black, thermal yarns. This technique creates panels that are inherently light blocking, noise reducing and energy saving, while seamlessly having a fashion curtain aesthetic.

Features & Highlights EASY INSTALLATION Rod Pocket design fits any standard or decorative rod for quick and easy installation. Ready to be hung right away. THERMABACK TECHNOLOGY Patented thermaback technology provides an insulated barrier against summer heat and winter chill to balance your room temperature and save on energy bills. AVAILABLE IN MORE COLORS The Tricia curtain comes in a variety colors to match any room and living space.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the color. Great texture.
reviews.reviewText: Thank you.Was confused by one pocket panel, as in one panel, I bought two so it works out. It also had one rod pocket which I was also looking for.Thanks. Great price. Nice weight.

reviews.reviewText: Exact as seen in the ads, I love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Beautiful color, soft, and works well with other colors. I had to add the end curtains because it didnt fit the entire window as advertised. The length is right if it is stretched out flat, so give yourself at least a few inches to account for it being woven on the curtain rod. Not completely blackout, but it serves it's purpose. Overall, I am very happy with the curtain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Looks so good in my bathroom. Lightens the mood & blends with my decor

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Color was off…
reviews.reviewText: The color on the site for stone looked like a cream color which i loved but then when i got it, it looks like a light grey instead. Maybe its my fault because stone should be a grey, but the photo was misleading. Other than that i still love Amazon ill just be returning the curtains for a different color.

reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It’s green not tan
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this twice in ivory and tan, they both came in as a light sage green. They were ordered separately and are the same color. No wonder they were so cheap. The quality was not bad, but you cannot count on the color match to be ANYTHING like the listed picture or expectation

Thought they would be thicker but still nice

I ordered on May 7th, arrived on May 13th. Shipped from the US. I ordered 2 of the Tricia Thermal Patio Door Panel, 100" x 84", Grey to use on my large living room window, which is approximately 8ft wide. Generally I need 4+ wide curtain panels to cover it, but that leads to many gaps between them that let a lot of light in when I don't want it. I purchased two of these to avoid some of those gaps and paired it with a room darkening curtain rod. Quite effective, if you keep in mind that these are room-darkening and not meant to be total blackout. The grommets are decent quality feeling, but plastic. They slide well when opening and closing.Comparing to my old Eclipse brand thermal curtains (the ones that had the rubbery layer on the back that peels, cracks and stick together in the heat), they are as effective at room darkening (even considering my previous ones were black with a thermal coating, and these are lighter grey without coating!) but I cannot yet compare to the thermal aspect. They also look nicer than the previous eclipse brand ones I had.I can also compare to another brand of curtains I've purchased off of Amazon and like, DecoNovo. These Eclipse curtains feel just slightly lower quality than the DecoNovo ones do; these are slightly less room darkening (but again, that is comparing black to these grey), slightly less silky feeling - these are a little rough in comparison. Deconovo are also made of a slightly heavier feeling material. All around if DecoNovo were A+, then these would be an A- in terms of look, effectiveness, and feel. Considering that the DecoNovo brand of the same size and style was significantly more expensive than these, I can live with the quality and price I paid.Overall, I am pleased with these and would recommend.
